name: Astronomy and Astrophysics 2
description: Second part of the AST 3018-3019 sequence. Stellar distance determination; spectral classification, magnitudes and the nature of color indices; binary stars; the interstellar medium; the Sun as a star; stellar interiors; star formation and stellar evolution; the structure of the Milky Way; the kinds of galaxies and their properties; groups, clusters and superclusters of galaxies; and cosmology. (P)
